message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its high-quality features and exceptional performance, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering the value it can bring to you, I propose a price of $12000 for this product. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to your response.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but my budget is limited. I would like to make a counteroffer of $9500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your budget constraints, I must respectfully decline. Our product offers unparalleled value and I believe it deserves a higher price. I am willing to negotiate further, so I propose a price of $10500 for the product. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to make a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.

I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Bob. After careful consideration, I am proposing a final offer of $11000 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product and acknowledges your budgetary concerns. I hope this offer is acceptable to you.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to make a counteroffer of $10500 for the product.

After reviewing your latest counteroffer, I am willing to consider a price of $10750 for the product. This price reflects a compromise between our positions and I believe it will be beneficial for both parties involved.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to make a counteroffer of $10600 for the product.
Considering your recent counteroffer, I am willing to agree on a price of $10800 for the product. I believe this price respects both our interests and I hope it will lead to a successful transaction.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to make a final counteroffer of $10700 for the product.
